All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccountScene
In this scene the user decides if he wants to log-in or create a new account.
ActionCache
 
Card
Abstract class that represents a generic card.
CardSide
All cards have two sides: "front" and "back".
CardsPlayabilityEvent
This event is sent in response to a CardsPlayabilityRequest.
ChosenObjectiveCardEvent
This event is used to notify about a player that chose its objective card.
ChosenStarterCardSideEvent
This event is used to notify that a player has chosen the side of his starter card.
CLI
 
CLICardUtils
Use this class for printing cards.
CLICommand
A CLICommand represents one of the possible command options available to the user in the CLI.
Client
This abstract class represents a client connection in the server.
CLIPrinter
This class provides static methods for writing formatted text
Command
This abstract class represents a command.
CommandConsumer<Command>
This class is a consumer of the command queues in the RMIConnectionHandler
Config
 
ConfigController
Handles the initial configuration phase of the client.
ConnectionCommand
This command is used to connect to the server to get a valid UserInfo assigned This command is to be intended as simply informational.
ConnectionHandler
This abstract class is the interface for the connection handler.
ConnectionLostScene
The user is in this scene when he loses the connection to the server.
ConnectionScene
Scene for selecting the connection type.
Controller
 
Coords
This class represents 2D coordinates that can be used to identify cards' position in the player board.
Corner
This class represents a corner of a card.
CornerPosition
This enum defines the position of a corner in a card.
CornerTypes
The enum defines all possible corner types.
CreateGameMenu
 
CreateLobbyCommand
This command is used to create a new lobby.
CreateLobbyError
Event send upon receiving an invalid create lobby command.
Deck<CardType>
A deck is a collection of cards, implemented as a stack of generic cards.
Decks
Util class to make things easier when starting a match.
DirectMessageCommand
Command to send a private message from a player to another.
DirectMessageEvent
A direct message from a player to another.
DrawCardState
The state of the game where a certain player needs to draw a card
DrawGoldDeckCardCommand
This command is used to draw a card from the gold deck.
DrawnGoldDeckCardEvent
This event is used to notify that a card has been drawn from the gold cards' deck.
DrawnObjectiveCardsEvent
Thi event notify that a player has drawn his possible objective cards.
DrawnResourceDeckCardEvent
This event is used to notify that a card has been drawn from the resource cards' deck.
DrawnStarterCardEvent
THis event is used to notify that a starter card has been drawn by a player.
DrawnVisibleGoldCardEvent
This event is used to notify that a card has been drawn from visible gold cards.
DrawnVisibleResourceCardEvent
This event is used to notify that a card has been drawn from visible resource cards.
DrawObjectiveCardsCommand
This command is used by a player to draw the two secrety initial objective cards.
DrawResourceDeckCardCommand
This command is used to draw a resource card.
DrawStarterCardCommand
This command is used to draw a starter card
DrawVisibleGoldCardCommand
This command is used to draw gold cards from the visible ones.
DrawVisibleResourceCardCommand
This command is used to draw a resource card from the visible ones
Elements
This interface defines the possible elements (resources and items in the game).
EndedInitializationPhaseEvent
This event is sent after initializing the model.
EndedObjectiveCardPhaseEvent
This event is sento to notify then end of the objective cards drawing phase.
EndedStarterCardPhaseEvent
This event is used to notify about the end of the starter cards drawing.
EndedTokenPhaseEvent
This event is used to notify the end of token phase.
EndingGameInitScene
Scene where the game is about to start with player turns (after setup phase)
Event
This abstract class represents an event.
GameCommand
This abstract class represents a game command.
GameController
Controller for the GameScene.
GameErrorEvent
This class is used to notify about a general error in the game phases.
GameEvent
This abstract class represents a game event.
GameEventHandler
This interface represents the game event handler, which is used to handle the game events coming from the server.
GameFlowManager
This class allows to manage a single game.
GameModel
This class contains the state of the game items.
GameModelUpdater
One of the tree main classes that manage a game.
GameResultsEvent
This event is used to notify about the results at the end of the game.
GameScene
The scene with the core game logic
GameServerActions
This class represents the action that can be performed on the game server.
GameStartedEvent
Event to signal that the game has been started.
GameState
A GameState refers to a state of the gameFlowManager (state machine), implemented using the state pattern.
GameViewActions
This class represents the action that can be performed on the client's game view.
GoldCard
A gold card is a playable card that requires resources to be placed on the board.
GoldDeckCreator
Implementation of DeckCreator for GoldCard cards.
GroupMessageCommand
Command to send a private message from a player to another.
GroupMessageEvent
Event for a message that is sent to all player in the lobby.
GUI
Main GUI application.
HomeScene
Starting scene of the game.
InitializationState
State through which the flow manager initializes the model
Items
This enum defines the game items.
ItemsObjectiveStrategy
Strategy to calculate points for an objective card based on items on a player board.
JoinGameMenu
 
JoinGameMenu.LobbyGame
 
JoinLobbyCommand
This command is used to join a lobby.
JoinLobbyController
Controller of the join lobby menu.
JoinLobbyError
Event sent upon receiving an invalid join lobby command.
KeepAliveCommand
This command is used to keep the connection alive.
KeepAliveEvent
This event is used to notify that the connection is still alive.
LastConnectedPlayerEvent
Event sent when the player is the last one connected to the game.
LastConnectedPlayerWonEvent
Event sent when the last connected player is the winner of the game.
LastPlayerScene
Scene where the player is the last one connected
LastPlayerWonScene
Scene where the player was the last one connected and won after the timer ended
LastRoundEvent
Event sent at the start of the last round of the game.
LeaveLobbyCommand
This command is used to leave a lobby.
LeaveLobbyError
Event sent upon receiving an invalid leave lobby command.
LobbiesEvent
This event is used to notify about the lobbies available.
LobbiesListController
Allows a player to visualize all available lobbies.
LobbiesScene
In this scene the user can join, leave and create lobbies.
Lobby
The lobby contains up to four users.
LobbyController
Allows to show the single lobby, after joining.
LobbyInfo
LobbyInfo contains all the info about a lobby at the time it was created.
LoginEvent
This event is used to notify a connecting/reconnecting client about the login result.
MainCommand
This abstract class represents a main command.
MainController
The class is used to allow the connection handler to have a single controller over time.
MainErrorEvent
This event is used to notify an error to a user in the main menu.
MainEvent
THis abstract class represents a main event.
MainEventHandler
This interface represents the main event handler, which is used to handle the main events coming from the server.
MainServerActions
This class represents the action that can be performed on the main server.
MainViewActions
This class represents the action that can be performed on the client main view.
MenuController
Controller for the main menu view.
MessageCommand
Command for a generic chat message.
MessageEvent
A generic event for chat messages.
ObjectiveCard
An objective card is a card that gives points to the players when the last turn ends if a certain condition is satisfied.
ObjectiveCardScene
Scene for objective card selection
ObjectiveCardSelectionState
The state represents the game phase where players choose their objective card between two given
ObjectiveDeckCreator
Implementation of DeckCreator for ObjectiveCard cards.
ObjectiveStrategy
Strategy pattern interface for calculating how many times an objective has been completed.
Observable
This class represents the observables in the Observer designed pattern.
Observer
This class represents the observers in the Observer pattern.
Pair<T1,T2>
Utility class, where each object is a pair of two objects.
PatternObjectiveStrategy
Strategy to calculate points for an objective card based on how many times a pattern is found on the player board.
PlayableCard
A playable card is a card that can be placed on the player's board.
PlayCardAction
 
PlayCardCommand
This command is used to play a card
PlayCardState
The state of the game where a certain player needs to play a card
PlayedCardEvent
This event is used to notify that a card has been played by a player.
Player
The class represents one client in game.
PlayerBoard
This class represents the area of the whole game table related to a single player.
PlayerElementsEvent
This event is used to notify about a player's updated elements' map.
PlayerHand
This class represents the three cards in a player's hand.
PlayerToken
This enum defines the possible tokens that identify players during a game.
PlayerTurnEvent
Event that signals that a player's turn started.
PointsType
The enum represents all possible points type of the cards, or the criteria according to which points are given to the player.
PopupObjective
 
PopupStarter
 
PopupTokens
 
PostGameState
State that represents the "post-game" part of the game.
ReconnectionCommand
This command is used to reconnect to the server.
ReconnectToGameEvent
This event is used to notify that the user is reconnecting to a game.
ResourceCard
A resource card is a playable card that doesn't require any resources to be placed on the board.
ResourceDeckCreator
Implementation of DeckCreator for ResourceCard cards.
Resources
This enum defines the resource domains.
ResultsScene
Scene with game results (final scoreboard)
RMIConnectionHandler
This class is the RMI implementation of the ConnectionHandler interface.
RMIGameServer
This class represents the RMI Game server to connect to.
RMIGameView
This class is the RMI implementation of the GameViewActions interface.
RMIHandler
This class is the RMI implementation of the Client abstract class.
RMIMainServer
This class represents the RMI Main server to connect to.
RMIMainView
This class is the RMI implementation of the MainViewActions interface.
Scene
Scenes of the CLI must extend this class.
SceneManager
The SceneManager is used for handling transitions between scenes of the CLI.
SceneNotRegisteredException
Runtime exception thrown when the requested scene hasn't been registered.
SceneTester
 
ScoreTrack
Class that represents the scoreboard.
SelectObjectiveCardCommand
Thi command is used to let a player choose its objective card in the game setup phase
SelectStarterCardSideCommand
Thi command is used to select the starter card side placement.
SelectTokenCommand
This command is used to select the token
Server
The server is implemented using the Singleton pattern.
ServerEventHandlerTask
 
ServerPrinter
Class used to print formatted messages in the server.
SetupPhaseController
Controller that manages the first part of the game.
SlimGameModel
Represents the model in a "slimmer" way.
SocketClientHandler
This class will handle the communication with the client.
SocketConnectionHandler
This class is the socket implementation of the ConnectionHandler interface.
SocketServer
This class represents the server side of the socket connection.
StarterCard
A starter card is the first card placed on each player's board.
StarterCardScene
Scene where the user can select the starter card.
StarterCardSelectionState
The state represents the game phase where players discover their starter card, and choose its side
StarterDeckCreator
Implementation of DeckCreator for StarterCard cards.
StartGameCommand
This command is used to start a game.
StartGameError
Event sent when there's an error after a start game command.
Status
This enum is used to represent the state of the client's connection.
TokenAssignmentEvent
This event is used to notify that a token has been assigned to a player.
TokenSelectionScene
Scene where the player selects his token.
TokenSelectionState
The state represents the game phase where players decide their game tokens
Trio<T1,T2,T3>
Utility class, where each object is a pair of three objects.
UI
 
UpdatedScoreTrackEvent
This event is used to notify an update of a player's points.
User
Contains an user's information (name and unique id).
UserInfo
UserInfo contains the information about an user at the time it was generated.
UserInfoLoginScene
Scene for logging in with the saved UserInfo.
UserInfoManager
UserInfoManager is used for loading and saving an UserInfo instance to file.
VisibleCardsList<CardType>
The class represents a list of visible cards on the game table.
